sentences.sContent: But now there is evidence that individualized advice can also be physiologically effective — that it can actually change your neural pathways.
sentences.sContent_eng: But now there is evidence that individualized advice can also be physiologically effective — that it can actually change your neural pathways.
sentences.sCn: 但是现在有证据表明，个性化的建议也可以产生生理影响——事实上它可以改变你的神经通路。

words.tran: 地文学，地相学；自然地理学；自然现象志

trans.tranCn: 生理上, 在生理学上
